name: GetFixedPrices

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

$ul: **dateRange**: Trade Policy Fixed Price Validity Period Object.
**from**: Indicates the date and time when the fixed price will start to be valid.
**to**: Indicates the date and time from which the fixed price will no longer be valid.
**minQuantity**: Trade Policy Fixed Price Minimum Item Quantity.
